object_name.value: Validate user is not an Approver of the selected document

title.value: Used to enforce independent ('four-eyes') approval in Cat 2 Controlled Document lifecycles.

You cannot designate yourself as an Approver of ''$value(object_name)''. This document must be approved by someone other than yourself.

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (select * from cd_controlled_doc(all) where r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)' and (any approvers = '$USER' or any approvers in (select group_name from dm_group where any i_all_users_names = '$USER')))
